name: Hot Date (itch) (vvspaceship)
description:
🔥 Hot Date 🔥 is a short sim about going on a date with another goblin at the hottest restaurant in town. 

Keep eating to show your date you're interested, and use your beer to keep cool  - but be careful! Too much of either will ruin the whole thing!

Hot Date was made using Inkle Studio's narrative scripting language Ink which you can find here: https://www.inklestudios.com/ink/

🔥 GAMEPLAY 🔥

Drag the word bubble you want to respond with onto your date. Left-click your food to eat, and left-click your beer to drink.

💋 Hot Date is part of the Very Very Spaceship Smooch Jam! 💋 Held over a weekend at the VVS Mothership the team set off to make games all about kissin'. Check out the other games here:
Smooch Labs
Long Distance Lovers
